articles.title: Iran general replacing Soleimani vows revenge for US killing
articles.description: An Iranian general who replaced the leader killed by a U.S. airstrike in Baghdad has vowed revenge as Tehran abandoned the remaining limits of its 2015 nuclear deal
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
An Iranian general who replaced the leader killed by a U.S. airstrike in Baghdad vowed in remarks aired Monday to take revenge as Tehran abandoned the remaining limits of its 2015 nuclear deal with world powers in response to the slaying.
